citations.narrative:
****There were no IACUC semiannual meeting minutes available for inspection after May of 2013.
****In order to comply with this section of the AWA research facilities shall maintain IACUC records which include
minutes of meetings,proposed activities involving animals,IACUC semiannual reports and recommendations.
***To be corrected by 7-30-2014.
****An exit interview was conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
2.35(a)
RECORDKEEPING REQUIREMENTS.
****There were no IACUC semiannual meeting minutes available for inspection after May of 2013.
****In order to comply with this section of the AWA research facilities shall maintain IACUC records which include
minutes of meetings,proposed activities involving animals,IACUC semiannual reports and recommendations.
***To be corrected by 7-30-2014.
****An exit interview was conducted with the facility representative.
